pageContent: Objectives: This was an ancillary methodological study within the Prostate Cancer Outcomes Study (PCOS) to assess the validity of 6-month retrospective recall of prediagnostic disease-targeted function among men diagnosed with prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Smoking and aggressive prostate cancer: a review of the epidemiologic evidence
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19562492/
